MemoryInfobox.description: 'A bandit's letter told of a cache of Athens|Athenian supplies just waiting to be stolen. The information fell into Kassandra's hands.'

General_Description: '''Thieving from Athenians''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a bandit, Kassandra discovered a note detailing the location of the [[Thief|thieves]]' loot.
Section_Messages: *''Let's see how far those cursed [[Athens|Athenians]] get without their supplies! Stealing from their camp won't be easy, but I've heard their guard falls asleep on his watch.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
